sections.heading: of petition or other motion.The guardian ad litem may file a petition and any other motion the guardian ad litem deems to be in the best interests of the person for whom the guardian ad litem has been appointed

sections.text:
30-4207.Filing of petition or other motion.

The guardian ad litem may file a petition and any other motion the guardian ad litem deems to be in the best interests of the person for whom the guardian ad litem has been appointed.

SourceLaws 2016, LB934, ยง 20.
